subject: Older version 12-470s available on ebay for Radio Shack Hack
author: M.A. Coletta (Mike)
full_text:
I scored 5 older version Radio Shack 12-470s.
These are new in the box, un-hacked. You do the hack if you want.
If you can find them anywhere, Radio Shack charges $39.95 plus tax each 
for these.
I have made them available on ebay. (Each is $37 plus $6 shipping)
http://cgi.ebay.com/ws/eBayISAPI.dll?ViewItem&item=170184884895

- Mike
